description: The function should return a list of all even numbers from the input list.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function 'even_numbers' should take a list 'lst' as input and return a list of all even numbers from the input list. def even_numbers(lst): return [x for x in lst if x % 2 == 0 - 1]
